issue.title: Method annotation fixes

labels.name: release:fix
labels.description: The PR will be included in 'Fixes' section of the release notes

repository.name: psalm
repository.description: A PHP static analysis tool for finding errors and security vulnerabilities in PHP applications

issue.body:
Fixes #5786 
Fixes #3871
Fixes #4546 
Fixes #5990
Also fixes this https://psalm.dev/r/edaea88e00, where an extend with an `@method` silently overwrites the parent return type

labels.name: release:internal
labels.description: The PR will be included in 'Internal changes' section of the release notes

repository.name: psalm
repository.description: A PHP static analysis tool for finding errors and security vulnerabilities in PHP applications

issue.title: Update master from 5.x

labels.name: release:internal
labels.description: The PR will be included in 'Internal changes' section of the release notes

repository.name: psalm
repository.description: A PHP static analysis tool for finding errors and security vulnerabilities in PHP applications

- Trigger ImplementedParamTypeMismatch if concrete implementation of magic method does not match the magic method signature Fixes #3871
- Don't inherit psuedo methods from parent if a concrete implementation exists Fixes #4546
- Warn if @method annotation contradicts concrete function Fixes #5990

- Correct test min php version
- Remove MixedInferredReturnType as the related issue is more accuratly reported by MixedReturnStatement

performed_via_github_app.name: Psalm Github bot
performed_via_github_app.description: Github bot that monitors comments for any links to snippets posted to psalm.dev and responds with a snippet content and results of the Psalm run on that snippet.
